title: K-lite Codec Pack 11.9.6 Mega - DailyApp
description:
K-lite Codec Pack 11.9.6 Mega - DailyApp 

 

Size: 40 MB

Requires: Win All

 

New Features:

K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of components needed for audio and video playback in DirectShow players such as Windows Media Player, Media Center, and Media Player Classic.Basic, Standard, Full, Mega as well as the latest update.

K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of components needed for audio and video playback in DirectShow players such as Windows Media Player, Media Center, and Media Player Classic. This Codec Pack is designed as a user-friendly solution for playing all your movie files.

It contains everything you need to play all common audio and video file formats. It also provides additional functionality such a thumbnail generation in Explorer.

The pack has a very advanced installer which is highly flexible and has unique problem solving capabilities.


What's NEW:

Updated MPC-HC to version 1.7.10.101
Updated LAV Filters to version 0.67-115-ga1883
Updated madVR to version 0.90.10
Updated Codec Tweak Tool to version 6.0.5
Added VP9 hardware acceleration option (DXVA2-CB only). Currently only the NVIDIA GTX 950/960/750v2 are capable of doing full accelerated decoding VP9 video.
madVR is now capable of outputting 3D video. It uses 3D frame packed output on compatible systems (Windows 8.1 or newer / HDMI 1.4+) and Side-By-Side (SBS) output on older systems.
LAV Video decoder is capable of decoding H.264 MVC 3D video after installing Intel media SDK plugin (separate download)
LAV Splitter supports reading H.264 MVC video from Matroska (.MKV) and (decrypted) Bluray discs (.M2TS/.SSIF)


 


* Just Run to use...

* Enjoy!
